title: Maalai En Vethanai Song Lyrics Sethu
stanzas:
Maalai en vedhanai kootuthadi
kadhal than velaiyai kaatuthadi

enai vaattum velai yaenadi
nee solvaai kanmani
mugam kaattu en pournami
en kadhal veenai nee

vedhanai sollidum raagathile
veguthe en manam mogathile

Maalai en vedhanai kootuthadi
kadhal than velaiyai kaatuthadi

Kadhalil thoatravar
kadhai undu ingae aaryiram.
vendaathan pechukkal
yaendaa ambi!!

kadhalum poiyyum illai
unmai kadhal mannil aayiram
un kadhal suspence-u
enna ambi

kadhal senjaa paavam
andha aadhaam kaalathil
edhukku veenaa sogam
kadhaiya mudidaa nerathil

poongili kaivarum naal varuma
boomiyil sorgamum thondridumaa

Katru vidum kelvikku
malar sollum badhilum ennavo
vaasangal pesaatha
badhilaa thambi

megam vidum kelvikku
vennilavin badhil ennavo
kadal aadum alai kooda
bathilthaan thambi

avalin mounam paarthu
pathai pathaikkum en manam
vendaam ennam
varum kadhal thirumanam

Maalai en vedhanai kootuthadi
kadhal than velaiyai kaatuthadi

enai vaattum velai yaenadi
nee solvaai kanmani
mugam kaattu en pournami
en kadhal veenai nee

vedhanai sollidum raagathile
veguthe en manam mogathile
